Info: Ventral surface, platform, lateral margins and termination are preserved
Broken flake, termination absent with evidence of initation present (e.g. platform, bulb of percussion, bulbar scar or fissures)
Broken flake, both proximal and distal margins absent (ie. termination and initiation points)
Distal fragment, termination preserved but proximal margin absent (e.g. missing platform)
Other fragment, typically amorphous with no characteristics of flakes, cores or tools
